sentences.en: An impartial investigation should always precede condemnation.
sentences.cn: 任何不偏颇的调查应该在指责之上.

sentences.en: Condemnation is ready for scoffers, and flogging for the backs of fools.
sentences.cn: 刑罚是为亵慢人预备的; 鞭打是为愚昧人的背预备的.

sentences.en: Excessive headline phrase condemnation is, of course, a possibility.

sentences.en: His condemnation made him an outcast.

sentences.en: His conduct calls for the severest condemnation.
sentences.cn: 他的行为有必要受到最严厉的惩办.

sentences.en: His own actions are his condemnation.
sentences.cn: 他自己的所作所为定了他的罪.

sentences.en: His total disregard for the feelings of others was his condemnation.

sentences.en: Miss Su's condemnation of Fang Hung - chien for being shameless was actually unjust.

sentences.en: Moreover, Jianru's illness can even lessen a little of my own feeling of self - condemnation.

sentences.en: Most who unveil agendas deserve the condemnation they receive.
sentences.cn: 那些露出真面目的人就应该承受他们应得的责难.

sentences.en: Our condemnation of him was a bit previous.

sentences.en: She spat out her condemnation in his face.
The condemnation scarred him for life.

sentences.en: The jury's condemnation was a shock to the suspect.

sentences.en: Their proposal met with almost universal condemnation.
sentences.cn: 他们的提议遭到了几乎所有人的反对.

sentences.en: There was widespread condemnation of Saturday's killings.
sentences.cn: 人们对星期六的几起杀人事件给予谴责。
